Package com.es.unex.practica_sistemas_inteligentes

Class Parameters

java.lang.Object
com.es.unex.practica_sistemas_inteligentes.Parameters
public class Parameters
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains the initial parameters read from the configuration file, the parameters will be used throughout the program and are enclosed here for easy reading. Since they must not change during the execution of the program, access to the properties is allowed in read-only mode.
Version:
0.1
Author:
eliapacioni

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Accident[] accidents
    Geographical incidents
    private boolean alSel
    Selection algorithm false: RouletteWheel true: Tournament
    private int avgCostAntennas
    Average cost of antennas * nMaxAntenna It is used to calculate the goodness of the price in fitness
    private boolean colors
    Color management in the terminal: true: activate colors, false: deactivate For the final printing of the individual is always active
    private CoverageArea[] coverageAreas
    Areas to be covered

    Number of elitist (can be between 0 and population size)

    Available antenna models

    Maximum number of antennas for an individual
    private boolean opCrossover
    Crossover operator false: crossoverMulti (2 points) true: crossover (1 point)
    private boolean opMutation
    Mutation operator false: mutate(Antennas[]), mutate an antenna true: mutate() , changes the position
    private float pCrossover
    Crossover Probility
    private float pMutation
    Probability of mutation
    private int popSize
    Population size
    private boolean replacement
    Type of replacement chosen, stationary or generational false: Stationary true: Generational

    Importance of area coverage in the algorithm
    private int weightingConnection
    Importance of connection between areas
    private int weightingCost
    Importance of keeping the cost of antennas low in the algorithm
